job.title: Automotive Test Engineer
job.description: pDynamic Research Inc a hightech applied research firm based in Torrance CA has an immediate opening for an analyticallyoriented Test Engineer to work in the automotive industryppstrongAssignments will includestrongpulliConducting instrumented dynamic and Advanced Driver Assistance Systems ADAS vehicle testing at our proving grounds near Bakersfield CA and occasionally at the proving grounds of our clients may at times involve night and weekend testingliliInstrumenting and preparing vehicles for testingliliWriting test reportsliliDeveloping test softwareliliAnalyzing dataliliDesigning new test equipmentliulpstrongRequirementsstrongpulliBS or MS degree in Mechanical or Aerospace Engineeringlili0  5 years of engineering experienceliliFamiliarity with MATLABliliStrong written and verbal communication skillsliliStrong automotive interestliliUS citizen or permanent residentliulpstrongStrongly desiredstrongpulliExperience with CADliliBackground in Dynamics and ControlliliFamiliarity with automotive sensors and data acquisitionliliMotorsports interest including performance driving experienceliulpnbspppDynamic Research Inc is headquartered in Torrance CA and has an office in Shafter CA near Bakersfield DRI was established in 1979 and specializes in applied research development and consulting in the areas of vehicle dynamics and control manmachine systems ergonomics biomechanics and structural mechanics In the automotive area this includes analysis simulation testing and prototype design and development DRI currently has a regular staff of 40 consisting of engineers and scientists technicians and support personnelppnbspppDynamic Research Inc is an Equal Opportunity Employerp
